npcMessage.comment: Well let's see here. I have one that makes an orange rug, one that makes a blue rug, one that can make a Nabooian sculpture, one that makes a table, and one that makes some sort of model gong. I will only give you one kit at a time so if you want another you are going to have to get rid of the one you currently have first.

playerMessage.comment: Let me have one of those orange rug kits.
I will take one of the blue rug kits.
I think I would like one of those model gong kits.
Let me have one that makes the table.
I think I will try out the one that makes the sculpture.
